rules_text:
[i]Augmented[/i] – When you cast this spell, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, copy it twice.
Choose a nonland permanent type. Each player sacrifices a permanent of the chosen type.
notes:
Like a Weed, Naturally, as a Matter of Course — Daisuke Ishiwatari
